name: Proxima Centauri b
description: Earth's closest potentially habitable exoplanet, featuring vast red-tinted plains under the light of its red dwarf star.

keyFeatures.name: Crimson Plains
keyFeatures.description: Endless plains bathed in red starlight, perfect for atmospheric photography

keyFeatures.name: Tidally Locked Zones
keyFeatures.description: Experience perpetual sunset in the habitable terminator zone

keyFeatures.name: Magnetic Auroras
keyFeatures.description: Spectacular light shows caused by intense stellar activity

activities.name: Surface Expedition
activities.description: Guided tours of the habitable terminator zone

activities.name: Aurora Photography
activities.description: Professional photography sessions of the magnetic auroras

name: Kepler-186f
description: First Earth-sized planet discovered in the habitable zone of another star, known for its unique crystalline formations.

keyFeatures.name: Crystal Valleys
keyFeatures.description: Vast valleys filled with naturally occurring crystalline structures

keyFeatures.name: Bioluminescent Flora
keyFeatures.description: Native plant life that produces its own light

keyFeatures.name: Floating Mountains
keyFeatures.description: Mountain ranges that hover above the surface due to magnetic fields

activities.name: Crystal Mining Experience
activities.description: Mine your own souvenir crystals with professional equipment

activities.name: Floating Mountain Climb
activities.description: Guided climbing expedition of the floating mountains

name: TRAPPIST-1e
description: Rocky super-Earth in the TRAPPIST-1 system, famous for its intricate network of underground cities.

keyFeatures.name: Subterranean Metropolis
keyFeatures.description: Vast network of underground cities with advanced architecture

keyFeatures.name: Quantum Gardens
keyFeatures.description: Gardens where plants exist in multiple states simultaneously

keyFeatures.name: Time Dilation Falls
keyFeatures.description: Waterfalls where time moves at different speeds due to gravitational effects

activities.name: Underground City Tour
activities.description: Guided tour of the subterranean civilization

activities.name: Quantum Gardening Workshop
activities.description: Learn to tend the quantum gardens

activities.name: Time Dilation Experience
activities.description: Supervised visit to the Time Dilation Falls
